wekabci.server
Class WekaServer

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      wekabci.server.WekaServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class WekaServer
extends java.lang.Thread

This is the main class for the WekaBCI server, it loads all the Weka models available in the specified folder, and processes all incoming requests creating a WekaThread per each connection. The WekaThread uses then an instance of the Protocol to process all the Messages coming from the client.

Author:
Jorge
